nodes.text: Senchiko was an individual that served as a Moff in the Galactic Empire. In the weeks following the death of Emperor Palpatine during the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, a male Imperial who had witnessed one of Palpatine's sentinels deliver orders for Operation: Cinder to start advised one of his female colleagues to seek new orders from Moff Senchiko or Admiral Malvor, both of whom he could not confirm to be alive, rather than learn about the operation.
Senchiko was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
